main event: A lightning-like object was observed for half a second in the sky.
interesting points: The object traversed the distance between two points at its base, indicating it may have been a meteor.
The object appeared greenish-reddish in color at the base.
The sighting was reported by an observer driving an automobile in Bethesda, Maryland.
The sighting occurred on November 15, 1957 at GMT 12/2332Z.
The report concludes the sighting was possibly a meteor.
